home.title: Protect Your Crypto. Avoid <highlight>Scam</highlight> & <highlight>Honeypot</highlight>.
home.subtitle: Scam Radar is your trusted Telegram bot for checking smart contract addresses and identifying potential risks before you buy. Instantly detect Scam, Honeypot, and suspicious activity‚Äîacross multiple blockchains and languages.

home.feature2Desc: Use Scam Radar in English, Ukrainian, Russian, Chinese, and Indonesian.
home.feature3Desc: Unlock unlimited checks, priority support, and advanced features with our premium plans.
home.footer: Join thousands of crypto buyers who trust Scam Radar to keep their investments safe. Don't get caught by scammers‚Äîcheck before you buy!

steps.title: Start the Bot
steps.desc: Open Scam Radar on Telegram to begin.

steps.title: Choose Blockchain
steps.desc: Select the blockchain you want to check (ETH, BSC, etc.).

steps.title: Send Contract Address
steps.desc: Paste or send the smart contract address you want to check.

steps.title: Get Instant Results
steps.desc: The bot analyzes the contract and shows you if it's a scam, honeypot, or safe.

steps.title: Upgrade for More
steps.desc: Unlock unlimited checks and premium features by upgrading your subscription.

steps.title: Stay Alert
steps.desc: Get tweets from the crypto community, right in the bot.

pricing.title: Upgrade to Premium
pricing.subtitle: Unlock unlimited checks, priority support, advanced risk analysis, and more!
pricing.info: Payment links will be available soon. For now, please use the bot to request an upgrade.

questions.question: Where can I find a token's smart contract?
questions.answer: Check CoinMarketCap, official project posts, or community announcements. The contract address is usually a long string like 0x2a...d9E1. Once you have it, paste it in the bot and select the right network.

questions.question: How do I check a token?
questions.answer: Tap 'Check token', choose the blockchain, and send the smart contract address.

questions.question: Which blockchains are supported?
questions.answer: Ethereum, Base, BNB Chain (BSC), and Solana. Choose the network where you plan to buy the token.

questions.question: How many free checks do I get?
questions.answer: You get 3 free token checks when you start using the bot. No subscription required. Need more? Get a subscription.

questions.question: What do the risk levels mean?
questions.answer: Tokens are scored from 1 to 100: Low (1‚Äì30), Medium (30‚Äì50), High (50‚Äì80), Very High (80‚Äì100). We check for Honeypot, liquidity issues, owner permissions, and more.

questions.question: How do I pay for a subscription?
questions.answer: You can pay securely via Tribute, which supports both crypto and fiat payments. Use any credit card or your favorite crypto wallet. Tribute is fast, safe, and works worldwide.

contacts.title: Get in Touch
contacts.footer: We're here to help! Reach out with any questions or feedback.
